title: no support
body: All my tiquets are closed automatically, help.

replies.body: Most tickets will provide you context as to why the ticket was closed. If you log into the [**Riot Support**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) page, you should be able to check on those tickets. Please provide me a ticket number if you still need more context on what happened with a specific ticket.

I took a look through this ticket and a few of your previous tickets as well. It looks like we've already provided context multiple times on the issue you've been creating tickets about. Additionally, you've been very aggressive to the support staff, which is not something we intend to ignore. You're free to reach out to support again, so long as you're inquiring about an issue that hasn't already been resolved and maintain your composure throughout the ticket.

I hope this clears up the confusion.
Welcome to Riot Games friend!  They are a very poorly ran company.  And I've yet to hear a testimonial of a good thing ever coming from contacting them.
